about_the_game:
Long ago, on the outskirts of Fauna, where many furry creatures lived in harmony, the rings of conflict echoed as a bizarre sequence of events unfolded from the dark. The plot revolves around Reynard, Varken and Koal as they journey to save Fauna from its perishing fate. Make new friends, battle epic foes, and overcome hurdles in your path as you seek the truth with heroic warriors by your side.



Join fellow adventurers at the Tavern of Ursidae to trade gossip, look for new quests, or just celebrate your victories. Utilize it as the hub for your adventures in this beautiful, expansive world, which is full of mysterious ruins, dark dungeons, majestic castles, and eerie ancient woodlands.

Game Features:

  • Discover hidden areas and secrets as you explore a stunning, interconnected, handcrafted world with over ten different biomes.
  • Play as three different characters and seamlessly switch between different playstyles and movesets. Charge into combat and swing your powerful sword, or lurk in the shadows and headhunt your victims with a crossbow.
  • Tight 2D controls, Jump, roll, dash, and attack through a fun, fast-paced combat system. Maybe freeze your enemies with an ice storm or burn them using a fire swirl.



  • There are over a hundred distinct items to find and equip and a vast selection of skills to choose from! Enabling you to completely change your build and playstyle.
  • Fight a plethora of unique enemies with dynamic AI, and fill your compendium with every creature you encounter on your journey.
  • Mix new potions with the help of the alchemist and forge new equipment and trinkets to help you on your adventures.
  • Epic souls-like boss battles with immersive AI, done with classic hand-drawn animations.



  • Harmonic music to accompany you on your adventures. Immerse yourself in more than a dozen passionately created compositions by our talented composer.
  • Beautiful hand-drawn pixel art environment with an interconnected metroidvania world and zero loading times.

short_description: Fulfill this tale, as darkness swarms the fantasy lands of Fauna. Venture epic kingdoms and treacherous dungeons in a 2D action platformer, with Metroidvania elements in a hand-crafted pixel art world filled with souls-like boss fights, dungeon platforming, and dynamic enemy combat design.
